Class SKPositionerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skobbler.ngx.positioner.SKPositionerManager

  • public final class SKPositionerManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which handles reporting new GPS locations.
    Version:
    2.5

      Creates a single instance of SKPositionerManager.
      void reportNewGPSPosition(SKPosition position)
      In a real navigation scenario, every time a new position is received from the GPS, the new position should be sent.
